subject: Including test cases with production code

messageBody:
Can someone explain why someone (i.e. a customer) would want to clutter
their storage or bandwith with test cases? The only reason I can think of is
if your application had the ability to run built-in diagnostics that were
included in order to help track down faults due to unanticipated
environmental conditions. Other than that, test cases are just dead code as
far as an end-user is concerned.

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Mike Silverstein

http://www.silvermark.com
